cause: Caused by Xanthomonas oryzae bacteria. It thrives in warm temperatures and high humidity.

shops.location: Shivaji Nagar Square, Opp. Railway Station
shops.name: Farmers Pride Shop

symptoms: Wavy yellow to white lesions on leaf edges

chemical.name: Copper Oxychloride + Streptocycline
steps: Dissolve 0.5g Streptocycline in a small amount of water first.
Add it to 1 liter water and mix 2.5g Copper Oxychloride.
Apply as a foliar spray focusing on infected patches.
Avoid spraying during high winds or rain.
chemical.usage: Mix 2.5g COC and 0.5g Streptocycline per liter.

organic.name: Neem Oil & Balanced Nutrition
steps: Mix 5ml Neem oil with 1 liter of fresh water.
Add 2-3 drops of liquid soap to help mixing.
Spray thoroughly on both sides of the leaves.
Repeat every 7 days during early morning or late evening.
